subject: Forgot Password
textBody:
You recently requested to reset your password for your Fujairah HR account. Please follow the link below to reset your password.
 {{ Link }} 
 Note: Your reset link will expire in {{ ExpireHours }} hours and can only be used one time. 
 For security, this request was received from a {{ OperatingSystem }} device using {{ Browser }}. If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email.
